id.description: Unique ID to be used in the event system. Default value is `undefined`.

noPin.description: If this parameter is equal to 'true', 'pin' button is removed from default template.

template.description: Custom template that gets resource IRI and knowledge panel ID as parameters `{{iri}}` and `{{knowledgePanelId}}` respectively.

trigger.description: Knowledge Panel Trigger component ID. Default value is `undefined`.
